name: Spooky Socks
description:
A very brief platformer where you guide a scaredy monster through his greatest fear

Made for the GMTK Game Jam of 2020

Designed by Cepukka, Missingnull and @Shabalalasrum

Coded by Cepukka and Missingnull

Art by @Shabalalasrum

Music:
